casebody.data:
THE CITY OF CAMDEN, PROSECUTOR, v. LOCAL GOVERNMENT BOARD, DEFENDANT. Submitted May 7th, 1940 Decided July 9, 1940.

Before Justices Case, Donges and Heher.

For the prosecutor, John J. Crean and William, J. Shepp. For the defendant, David T. Wilentz and John F. Bruther. Per Curiam.

An examination of the record on this application for a writ of certiorari discloses that fairly debatable questions are presented, which should receive judicial consideration, and, accordingly, the writ of certiorari is allowed.
